Dear Bincy,

 

Thanks for the notification.

 

Putting aside the quantum of this claim, kindly advise on the following:

*	We note that this cargo was delivered on July 03, 2024 and was only reported today – please clarify on the huge delay on reporting.
*	Please share the notice from Sephora AUH, Marina Mall reporting the shortage of received cargo

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar
